General.Name: LiaonWellhope Agri-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Wellhope Foods Co., Ltd. produces and sells feed products for swine, poultry, ruminant animals, aquaculture, and fur-farmed animals in China. It is also involved in trading of live broiler and broiler parts products; finisher, piglet, and pig breeders; fish meal, soybean meal, and co-products of corn; amino acid, antioxidant, mold inhibitors, and vitamins, as well as trades products, such as vaccines and veterinary drugs. The company engages in broiler breeder raising, day-old chick hatching, feed production, commercial broiler rearing, slaughtering, and processing of raw meat related activities. In addition, it processes and prepares cooked food. Further, the company is involved in farming and selling of piglet and fattening. It exports its products. Wellhope Foods Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.

3.Name: Ms. Xin  Zhao
3.Title: Chief HR Officer, Board Sec. & Director
